originalText.text: I was in goso for 2 years I got multiple jobs my osha after my probation was finished thanks to gos for writing my judge n probation officer I got out of jail for smoking weed after only 90days when my probation officer tried to get an 1-3 years i stopped going and went back to my street lifestyle now it’s 6 years later I’m 27 and the only time in my life I can say I was doing good legit in life (meaning not selling drugs) was when I attended goso I have friends from my days at goso I went to prison for 3 years my worker reached out and wrote me to help boast my Morral shoutout Chelsea Jeff, Julia, and the rest of the staff. I can’t remember the name they care bout change I’m looking for employment and 95% of my job history is goso

originalText.text: Very supportive and helpful, got me a job in less than a month regardless of my criminal background.

text.text: Very supportive and helpful, got me a job in less than a month regardless of my criminal background.

originalText.text: Could not be happier with the results. True people who care and value the progress help with a positive re entry to society. Providing you the tools and preparation to deal with real life support. I would highly recommend and if you want to change your life and become a productive member of society and your community. But it starts with you!

originalText.text: Great Place for Youths growing into Young Men,That was in prison. They are able to get stability, jobs,public assistance, support, Unity. A way to stay off the street,stay outta prison,Most Importantly keep there life's on track! Positive Place For Our Future!

originalText.text: Great Place for Young Man 16 through 24 years old that has been or is currently negatively impacted by the criminal justice system. This place helps with education and employment opportunity. I am an alumni of this program.
